message: Hey future me! I hope you're doing amazing. Right now I'm feeling so hopeful about the future and excited about all the possibilities ahead. Remember to stay curious and keep chasing your dreams!
I just started learning guitar today! My fingers hurt and I can barely play a chord, but I'm determined to get better. By the time you read this, I hope you're playing beautiful music!
Today I decided to be braver and more honest with people I care about. I told Mom how much she means to me, called an old friend, and finally said 'I love you' first. Growth feels scary but amazing!
